publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1877 Mr Brian Monteith: Support for Golf Caddying Vocational Qualification—That the Parliament congratulates St Andrews Links Trust and Elmwood College, Cupar on the launch of their Caddie Connect course which will help to raise standards and enhance the reputation of golf caddies through the provision of vocational courses in caddying both here and abroad via a distance learning course.

S1M-1877 Mr Brian Monteith: Support for Golf Caddying Vocational Qualification—That the Parliament congratulates St Andrews Links Trust and Elmwood College, Cupar on the launch of their Caddie Connect course which will help to raise standards and enhance the reputation of golf caddies through the provision of vocational courses in caddying both here and abroad via a distance learning course. Supported by: Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Phil Gallie*, David McLetchie*
S1M-1877 Support for Golf Caddying Vocational Qualification (lodged on 26 April 2001) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-1877 Support for Golf Caddying Vocational Qualification (lodged on 26 April 2001) Michael Russell*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Mary Scanlon*
S1M-1877 Support for Golf Caddying Vocational Qualification (lodged on 26 April 2001) Mr Keith Harding*

S1M-1877 Mr Brian Monteith: Support for Golf Caddying Vocational Qualification—That the Parliament congratulates St Andrews Links Trust and Elmwood College, Cupar on the launch of their Caddie Connect course which will help to raise standards and enhance the reputation of golf caddies through the provision of vocational courses in caddying both here and abroad via a distance learning course. Supported by: Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Phil Gallie, David McLetchie, Donald Gorrie, Michael Russell, Tricia Marwick, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mary Scanlon, Mr Keith Harding

S1M-1877 Mr Brian Monteith: Support for Golf Caddying Vocational Qualification—That the Parliament congratulates St Andrews Links Trust and Elmwood College, Cupar on the launch of their Caddie Connect course which will help to raise standards and enhance the reputation of golf caddies through the provision of vocational courses in caddying both here and abroad via a distance learning course. Supported by: Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Phil Gallie, David McLetchie, Donald Gorrie, Michael Russell, Tricia Marwick, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mary Scanlon, Mr Keith Harding
S1M-1877 Support for Golf Caddying Vocational Qualification (lodged on 26 April 2001) Andrew Wilson*
